Mario Game

what this is

I remember playing Mario when I was younger. Doing this project taught me a lot about how powerful plain JavaScript can be when you understand what is happening. I usually used atom when I code but I decided to use vs code for the first time on this project. I chose to replicate the Mario to improve some stuff in the game.
